# Trajectory differential expression {.tabset}

## Datasets
```{r, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
datasets <- inputs[["expression"]] %>% 
  map(read.table, row.names = 1, header = TRUE, sep = ",") %>% 
  map_df(function(expression) {
    tibble(
      n_cells = nrow(expression),
      n_features = ncol(expression)
    )
  })

datasets %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n_cells)) +
   geom_density() +
  theme_bw()
```
